item.title: Computation parameters
item.description: üåè‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç (‡§∏‡§π‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞-‡§®‡§ó‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç, ‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§£‡§™‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ä) Basic parameters lunar_month_assigner_type = "MULTI_NEW_MOON_SIDEREAL_MONTH_ADHIKA" ayanaamsha_id = "CHITRA_AT_180" jsonClass = "ComputationSystem" Event options aparaahna_as_second_half = false prefer_eight_fold_day_division = false julian_handling = "converted to Gregorian" jsonClass = "FestivalOptions" Repos: general, gRhya/general, gRhya/Apastamba, tamil, mahApuruSha/general, devatA/pitR, devatA/shaiva, devatA/umA, devatA/graha, devatA/nadI, devatA/shakti, devatA/gaNapati, devatA/kaumAra, devatA/vaiShNava, devatA/lakShmI, devatA/misc-fauna, devatA/misc-flora, mahApuruSha/kAnchI-maTha, mahApuruSha/ALvAr, mahApuruSha/vaiShNava-misc, mahApuruSha/mAdhva-misc, mahApuruSha/smArta-misc, mahApuruSha/sangIta-kRt, mahApuruSha/xatra, mahApuruSha/xatra-later, mahApuruSha/RShi, mahApuruSha/nAyanAr, temples/venkaTAchala, temples/Andhra, temples/Tamil, temples/Kerala, temples/Odisha, temples/North, time_focus/sankrAnti, time_focus/puShkara, time_focus/yugAdiH, time_focus/misc, time_focus/Rtu, time_focus/nakShatra, time_focus/Eclipses, time_focus/misc_combinations, time_focus/monthly/amAvAsyA, time_focus/monthly/ekAdashI, time_focus/monthly/dvAdashI, time_focus/monthly/pradoSha
